stories.title: Hegseth gives Anthropic until Friday to drop AI safeguards for militaryPublished6 minutes agoThe defense secretary threatened to declare the AI startup a supply chain risk or invoke the Defense Production Act if it refuses.51 sources
House falls one vote short on DC crash safety bill45 sources
Trump weighs order requiring banks to collect citizenship data125 sources
Fed officials warn AI could reshape jobs, rates37 sources

US and NATO launch major Arctic exercises amid rising tensionsPublished2 hours agoNORAD and U.S. Northern Command began Arctic Edge 2026 on Feb. 23, a three-week drill across Alaska and Greenland as NATO consolidates Arctic operations.51 sources
Russia opens criminal case against Telegram's DurovPublished3 hours agoThe FSB accuses the Telegram founder of facilitating terrorist activities, a charge carrying up to life in prison.61 sources
Supreme Court shields USPS from suits over withheld mail31 sources
Trump to pitch economic wins in State of the Union address57 sources
Oklahoma lawmakers weigh data center moratorium as water demands soar60 sources

Savannah Guthrie offers $1M reward for missing motherPublished5 hours agoThe "Today" show host's family reward brings the total to $1.2 million, 24 days after Nancy Guthrie was taken from her Arizona home.40 sources

New US tariffs take effect at 10%, below rate Trump promisedPublished5 hours agoCustoms officials began collecting the lower rate Tuesday with no explanation, adding to confusion over trade policy after the Supreme Court struck down prior tariffs.57 sources
US details alleged secret Chinese nuclear test, urges disarmament talks41 sources
Cook, Huang, Su got secret CIA briefing on China-Taiwan threat61 sources
Trump taps Pentagon AI to set prices for critical minerals40 sources

Russia losing troops faster than it can replace them, Western officials sayPublished6 hours agoAs the war in Ukraine marks its fourth anniversary, Western officials say Moscow's battlefield losses have outpaced recruitment for three straight months.41 sources

Meta signs 6-gigawatt AI chip deal with AMDPublished8 hours agoAMD issued Meta a warrant for up to 160 million shares, with vesting tied to shipment milestones across a multi-year GPU deployment.45 sources
NPR finds DOJ deleted Epstein files tied to Trump53 sources
Russia warns US nuclear testing would trigger 'domino effect'44 sources
Iran nears deal to buy supersonic missiles from China41 sources

Oil tanker costs hit 6-year high as US-Iran war fears mountPublished9 hours agoMiddle East crude exports topped 19 million barrels per day in February, the most since April 2020, as traders rush to secure shipments.64 sources

Software stocks rally as Anthropic unveils enterprise partnershipsPublished2 hours agoAnthropic introduced ten new plug-ins for its Claude AI platform with major partners, easing weeks of fear that AI would replace existing software businesses.80 sources
Trump to unveil tech industry energy pledges at State of the Union78 sources
Court filings reveal Facebook's unreleased teen app Bell90 sources
Jupiter's moons may have formed with life's building blocks, studies find50 sources

Microsoft teams with Starlink to bring internet to underserved communitiesPublished2 hours agoThe partnership, unveiled at MWC 2026, aims to build "AI-ready communities" in rural and hard-to-reach regions worldwide.79 sources

DeepSeek's V4 AI model appears imminent, raising fears of another Nasdaq selloffPublished3 hours agoCNBC reports the anticipated release of DeepSeek's coding-focused model could rattle tech stocks, echoing the $593 billion Nvidia rout a year ago.87 sources

Chinese AI models capture 61% of token use on OpenRouter63 sources
Flock surveillance cameras destroyed in at least 5 states amid ICE backlash62 sources

OpenAI tells investors its agents will replace Salesforce, Adobe, WorkdayPublished4 hours agoThe claim, made during a pitch for a funding round that could top $100 billion, has deepened a sell-off erasing over $1 trillion from software stocks.84 sources

DJI sues FCC over drone ban, alleging no evidence of security threatPublished5 hours agoThe Chinese drone giant filed a petition with the Ninth Circuit challenging the agency's decision to block new DJI models from the U.S. market.64 sources
Anthropic proposes theory for why AI chatbots act human-like48 sources
Study finds ChatGPT Health missed over half of emergencies in triage test51 sources
Anthropic launches new Claude Cowork plugins for HR, banking, and design87 sources

Musk accuses Anthropic of 'stealing training data' after its claims against Chinese AI labsPublished6 hours agoThe attack came after Anthropic alleged three Chinese firms ran "industrial-scale" distillation campaigns using 16 million Claude queries.41 sources

Microsoft launches sovereign cloud for fully offline AI and productivityPublished6 hours agoThe expansion lets governments and regulated industries run large AI models, Office apps, and Azure infrastructure with no internet connection.30 sources
Waymo launches robotaxis in 4 new cities, doubling to 10 US markets63 sources
MIT report exposes hidden human labor behind humanoid robots96 sources
CrowdStrike reports 89% surge in AI-powered cyberattacks49 sources

Anthropic CEO compares AI's rapid advance to a tsunami society is ignoringPublished9 hours agoDario Amodei warned of enormous economic and geopolitical risks from AI in a candid podcast recorded in Bangalore with Zerodha co-founder Nikhil Kamath.47 sources

White House calls viral AI crash report 'science fiction'Published30 minutes agoA top White House economist dismissed Citrini Research's hypothetical scenario of AI-driven economic collapse after the report fueled a global stock selloff.114 sources
Activist funds target Blue Owl as AI fears roil private credit61 sources
U.S. sets steep anti-subsidy duties on solar imports from 3 nations78 sources
Tech stocks stage modest rebound after AI-fueled selloff87 sources

Arnault family crosses 50% ownership of LVMH for the first timePublished1 hour agoThe luxury empire's founder capitalized on a prolonged share slump to push his family's stake to 50.01%, valued at roughly $165 billion.47 sources

Weinstein warns 'wheels coming off' private creditPublished2 hours agoThe activist investor said Blue Owl Capital's fund turmoil marks just the beginning of a broader unraveling in the $1.8 trillion private credit market.63 sources
U.S. home prices post weakest annual gain in 14 years66 sources
US development finance agency pivots toward sovereign wealth fund model73 sources
California seeks injunction to halt Amazon's alleged price-fixing49 sources

Economists rank deficit reduction as top US priority after tariff rulingPublished3 hours agoA new NABE survey found 61% of business economists view fiscal policy as "too stimulative," the highest share since 2018.64 sources

All but richest 5% pay higher taxes in 2026, ITEP findsPublished3 hours agoA new analysis says Trump's tariffs, expired health care credits, and the 2025 tax law combine to raise the tax burden on 95% of Americans.116 sources
Citrini report co-author calls for AI tax after selloff shook global markets38 sources
Trump's new tariff regime exempts aerospace industry53 sources
Spirit Airlines reaches deal to exit bankruptcy as smaller carrier88 sources

Wall Street rebounds as AMD-Meta chip deal lifts sentiment after Monday's routPublished4 hours agoStocks clawed back losses after a viral AI doomsday report and new Trump tariffs rattled markets, while a major GPU deal boosted chipmaker shares.88 sources

Viral AI doomsday report helps fuel Dow's worst day in a monthPublished4 hours agoA fictional Citrini Research memo imagining AI-driven economic collapse went viral and contributed to a broad Wall Street selloff alongside renewed tariff fears.56 sources
Family offices fuel luxury hotel buying wave in NYC, London85 sources
FDIC: US banks posted record $295.6B in profits in 202572 sources
US consumer confidence edges up, topping forecasts after January's 12-year low63 sources
